resources.string: The most popular Minecraft animation and music application worldwide.

This is the application that allows you to watch and listen to all the animation and music about Minecraft. Sync all the new videos and music with the Cloud Database automatically without updating the app. Download it today!
If you want to translate this app, please visit: https://github.com/GoneTone/Animation-Music---Minecraft-Language
No violation to the law, this application is running under the Standard YouTube License.
Email: team@reh.tw Official Line Account: @HWQ3507L
Contact the developer of the app: Lineï¼š29022716 Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/reh.tw.sw
Official Website: http://reh.tw
[Disclaimer] Animation & Music - Minecraft is an unofficial application. I'm not the developer of MojangAB. The app is only for you to enjoy the animation and music about Minecraft. The icon of this app is authorized by MojangAB. "Minecraft" is a trademark of Mojang AB. We follow the terms of Minecraft Terms of Minecraft: https://minecraft.net/terms
